# Data Sources

<br>

| Data | Description | Geometry | Format | Source |
|------|-------------|----------|--------|--------|
| HDB | Location of HDB flats in Singapore [(Source)](kaggle.com/mylee2009/singapore-postal-code-mapper) | Point | CSV | MyleeSG on kaggle |
| School | Location of schools, geocoded from CSV [(Source)](https://data.gov.sg/dataset/school-directory-and-information) | Point | Shapefile | data.gov.sg |
| Population | Resident data by planning subzone, age group, sex and type of dwelling [(Source)](https://www.singstat.gov.sg/find-data/search-by-theme/population/geographic-distribution/latest-data) | NA | CSV | Department of Statistics Singapore |
| Pre-Schools | Location of childcare centres and kindergartens [(Source)](https://data.gov.sg/dataset/pre-schools-location) | Point | Shapefile | data.gov.sg |
